OB: Build F1 + UI Head stream.Create a project A with a file a.txtSelect the file and press "Ctrl C", "Ctrl V".I dialog will popup asking the user for a new name.Press cancel.The following exception will be logged.BTW: I liked the old behavior better.
SR: Bug 18047Internal Error copying a file in the navigator. Build F1 + UI Head stream.Create a project A with a file a.txtSelect the file and press "Ctrl C", "Ctrl V".I dialog will popup asking the user for a new name.Press cancel.The following exception will be logged.BTW: I liked the old behavior better.
